name: Noise Cancelling Headphones of Isolation
description: Blocks out the haters. Advantage on Concentration checks.

name: Hoodie of Anonymity
description: A plain black hoodie. You blend into any urban environment.

name: Ergonomic Laptop Stand
description: Prevents posture damage during long work sessions.

name: Blue Light Glasses
description: Protects eyes from screen glare. See through digital illusions.

name: Mechanical Keyboard of Clacking
description: Deals damage through pure sensory assault. Annoying to everyone nearby.

name: Hydroflask of Hydration
description: Holds infinite water (or iced coffee). Stay hydrated, stay chill.

name: Power Bank of Infinite Charge
description: Never run out of battery again. A nomad's holy grail.

name: Vintage Film Camera
description: Takes photos that look better than reality. Instant aesthetic.

name: Yoga Mat of Grounding
description: Center yourself. The mat provides unexpected stability.

name: Ironic T-Shirt
description: A shirt with a vague slogan. Says nothing, implies everything.

name: Hydroflask of VSCO
description: And I oop. Can be used as an improvised weapon.

name: Fidget Spinner of Focus
description: Reduces anxiety through repetitive motion.

name: Vape Pen of Cloudkill
description: Cast Cloudkill once per day. Mango flavored poison cloud.

name: Avocado of Everlasting Toast
description: Regenerates every morning. Millennials can't resist it.

name: Beanie of Hipsterdom
description: Makes you look like you listen to bands no one's heard of.

name: Flannel Shirt of Lumbersexuality
description: Look rugged without doing manual labor. Peak aesthetic.

name: Doc Martens of Stomping
description: Heavy boots that command respect with every step.

name: Tote Bag of Holding
description: A canvas bag with impossible capacity. Very sustainable.

name: Reusable Straw of Virtue
description: You are saving the turtles. Let everyone know.

name: Mason Jar of Aesthetics
description: Everything tastes better in a jar. It's science.

name: Ring Light of Vanity
description: Perfect lighting anywhere. Your best angle, always.

name: Selfie Stick of Reach
description: A quarterstaff for the modern age. Extended reach.

name: Portable Charger of Life
description: Emergency power for desperate times.

name: Bluetooth Speaker of Annoyance
description: Plays music loudly in public. Assert dominance.

name: Smart Watch of Anxiety
description: Notifies you of everything. Knowledge at a cost.

name: Fitbit of Shaming
description: Vibrates judgmentally if you haven't moved.

name: Peloton of Penance
description: Stationary bike of suffering. Cleanses the soul.

name: Yoga Pants of Comfort
description: Counts as unarmored. Maximum flexibility.

name: Weighted Blanket of Security
description: Like a hug that doesn't judge you.

name: Essential Oils of Placebo
description: Cures minor ailments through belief. Maybe.

name: Himalayan Salt Lamp of Vibes
description: Cleanses the energy in any room. Allegedly.

name: Succulent of Neglect
description: Thrives on being ignored. A kindred spirit.

name: Monstera of Wealth
description: The plant that indicates you've made it.

name: Chemex of Snobbery
description: Makes pour-over coffee. You'll explain the process.

name: Aeropress of Travel
description: Portable coffee anywhere. A nomad essential.

name: Moka Pot of Patience
description: Takes forever but worth it. Teaches mindfulness.

name: French Press of Grit
description: Coffee with texture. Builds character.

name: Cold Brew of Jitters
description: Concentrated caffeine. Handle with care.

name: Oat Milk of Superiority
description: Dairy free. Environmentally conscious. Slightly smug.

name: Almond Milk of Sustainability
description: Uses too much water. A guilty pleasure.

name: Standing Desk Converter
description: Transform any surface into a standing workspace.

name: Ergonomic Mouse of Carpal Prevention
description: Protects your wrist. Your livelihood depends on it.

name: Pomodoro Timer of Productivity
description: 25 minutes of focus. 5 minutes of despair.

name: Bullet Journal of Organization
description: More time decorating it than using it.

name: Noise Machine of White
description: Drowns out distractions. Or conversations you're avoiding.

name: Kindle of Infinite Books
description: A library in your pocket. You'll definitely read them all.

name: AirPods of Ignoring
description: The universal signal for 'don't talk to me'.

name: Moleskine of Pretension
description: The notebook of serious thinkers. Or people who want to look like them.

name: Passport Holder of Organization
description: Keeps your documents safe. Shows you travel.

name: Universal Adapter of Compatibility
description: Works in any country. A true citizen of nowhere.

name: Packing Cubes of Efficiency
description: Marie Kondo your luggage. Does it spark joy?
